description:
Dan of Steel`s Stand, The Lovers, has entered Joseph`s brain. Dan puts himself at an advantage, with having Joseph`s life on the line, and tells Jotaro to do various things for him, knowing Jotaro has no choice but to obey. Meanwhile, Kakyoin and Polnareff also enter Joseph`s brain with their Stands and find the Stand that is using brain cells as food.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恋人[ラバーズ] その2
